name: backstage monolith: an offstage play in 3 days and 3 monologues
name_original: backstage monolith: an offstage play in 3 days and 3 monologues
description:
backstage monolith: an offstage play in 3 days and 3 monologues is a game i created for the cosmic horrors jam from 23rd - 24th october 2022. it matches the optional theme "theatrical". in this experience you are confronted with and helpless against unexplained phenomena, interrupted by 3 short monologues (and an absent audience).

it also is a game with a fancy 3d main menu without 2d buttons.

* * *

(Using from the Unity Asset Store: Creature Theme - EyeBat by Dr. Game, Hunter's Deerblind by Gabro Media, FREE Rockstar Asset Pack by Ferocious Industries, FREE Floral Gold Jar by Monqo Studios, Lowpoly Anubis - FREE by Devden, FREE Flower Ceramic Vases by Monqo Studios, Furniture FREE Pack by Dexsoft Games, Sci-Fi Chair by Arseny Korablev, Sand Clock by 3D.Rina, Horse Statue by chermandirkun, 6 x 3D Cute Toy Models by Psionic Games, HQ Acoustic system by Next Level 3D, Shield,Sword,Spear by inari_green, Chess Pieces & Board by Joe Censored Games 2, Bathroom Props by Kobra Game Studios, Free Desert Plants by Lemuria, Toon Furniture by Elcanetay)
